name: Bright Minds Learning
longDescription: Bright Minds provides tailored support for children with dyslexia through experienced educators.

name: Focus First Center
longDescription: Focus First Center specializes in ADHD support using modern behavioral techniques.

name: Mindful Learning Hub
longDescription: Mindful Learning Hub offers a range of services for children on the autism spectrum, including therapy and educational support.

name: Inclusive Education Center
shortDescription: Comprehensive support for special needs education.
longDescription: Inclusive Education Center provides a wide range of services for children with various special needs, including individualized education plans.

name: Learning Pathways
longDescription: Learning Pathways offers professional speech therapy to help children improve their communication skills.
